segments.text: Ugh, that overflowing sink is really quite disgusting to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water just pouring onto the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's probably getting into all the crevices and under the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman is standing right in it, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is sloshing around in what could become a breeding ground for mold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the dampness and the stickiness of the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of water damage to the kitchen makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a mess that will take ages to clean up properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just screams neglect and potential damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation gives me a bad feeling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water too.
segments.speaker: PAR
